On Saturday 07 June 2008 10:58:55 Nishant Karve wrote:

> I am new to JUnit. However I have configured and written 
> some simple use cases. Could anybody please tell me
> how can I write test case for method returning void, 

If the method /does/ something (once hopes so), test for that
something.

> method returning iterator.

I'd pour the iterator contents into a list and test the list.

Don't we have a FAQ somewhere?
